AUTHOR: Sentry
INSTALL_MSG:
Thank you for installing EmbedNotification.
Its part of the cogs from Sentry-Cogs rewritten for a better use
NAME: embednotification
SHORT: Allows you to quickly embed notification and set a nice color
DESCRIPTION: Gives you the option to embed notification into a good looking embed with a colored sidebar which can be set using a hexadecimal color value
